data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Kat: I can't find my cellphone anywhere!
Sean: Have ____ looked ____ the ____? That's ____ I ____ find ____.
Kat: No, I ____ checked. Maybe I left ____ in ____ car.
Sean: Oh ____! I saw it sitting on a seat in the car.
data.partBlankContent:
Kat: I can't find my cellphone anywhere!
Sean: Have y__ looked un___ the so__? That's wh___ I alw___ find i_.
Kat: No, I alr____ checked. Maybe I left i_ in t__ car.
Sean: Oh ye__! I saw it sitting on a seat in the car.
data.fullContent: Kat: I can't find my cellphone anywhere! Sean: Have you looked under the sofa? That's where I always find it. Kat: No, I already checked. Maybe I left it in the car. Sean: Oh yeah! I saw it sitting on a seat in the car.
data.answer: 凯特:我找不到我的手机了！ 肖恩:你找过沙发下面了吗?我总是在那里找到它。 凯特:没找到，我已经检查过了。可能忘在车里了。 西恩:哦!我看到它坐在车里的一个座位上。
